info.title: Taman Kehati API
info.description: API for Taman Keanekaragaman Hayati (Kehati) Indonesia Data Platform

post.description: Login endpoint that returns an access token

schema.title: Response Login Api Auth Login Post

get.description: Get list of all users (super admin only)

schema.title: Response Read Users Api Users  Get

post.description: Create a new user (super admin only)

get.description: Get a specific user by ID (super admin only)
Get list of all Taman Kehati

schema.title: Response Read Tamans Kehati Api Taman Kehati  Get

post.description: Create a new Taman Kehati (admin only)

get.description: Get a specific Taman Kehati by ID
Get list of all plant collections

schema.title: Response Read Koleksis Tumbuhan Api Koleksi Tumbuhan  Get

post.description: Create a new plant collection (admin only)

get.description: Get a specific plant collection by ID
Export plant collection data in Darwin Core format

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of records to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of records to return

get.description: Export plant collection data in GeoJSON format
